column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student was registered but subsequently dropped the course or section within the normally allotted time period

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student was registered but subsequently dropped the course or section past the normally allotted time period, typically resulting in a special grade or mark to so indicate

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student has registered for the course by has not paid the fee

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student plans on taking this course or program

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student is officially registered for the course or section

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The student attempted to join but has been put on the waitlist
